sentences.en: Andean dancers wearingfeathered hats walk during celebrations in honor of the Lord of "QoyllurRit'i" near the town of Tayankani in Cuzco, on June 22, 2011.
sentences.cn: 2011年6月22日，库斯科的塔亚卡尼镇附近举办的节庆活动中，安第斯山脉的舞者身着羽毛做成的帽子行走在山间。

sentences.en: Cuzco the capital city, was said by the Spanish to be "as fine as any city in Spain".
sentences.cn: 库斯科首都被西班牙人认为“其精致可以媲美西班牙的任何城市”。

sentences.en: In total, slides have killed five people in the Cuzco region.
sentences.cn: 在库斯科地区泥石流总共已使5人丧生。

sentences.en: Peru: Cuzco and Apur í mac and Huallaga rivers & Colombian border.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁: 库斯科,阿亚库乔地区,埃内河谷,阿普里马克省和瓦亚加河 和 哥伦比亚边境.

sentences.en: The incas believed that cuzco was the navel of the universe.
sentences.cn: 印加人认为库斯科是宇宙的中心.

trans.tran_cn: 库斯科（秘鲁南部城市）(11世纪初起至16世纪为印加帝国首都)
